247027.「おい！ おめえらっ！\n いったい どこへ 行っちまったんだ！？:
Hey! You guys! Where the hell did everyone
go?!

247032.「お…俺様が こんなシロウトに……\n 白銀の星夜祭だ なんだと\n 浮かれてる:
I can't believe I lost to some amateur, giddy
little punk who just wanted to see the Starry
Night Festival...

247033.「……だが 約束は 約束だイェイ。\n 雪だるまにした連中は\n 元に 戻してや:
...but a promise's a promise. I'll change
those snowmen back to normal...

247035.「……あなたの おかげなのね。: You're the one who helped me, aren't you?

247037.「さっきは シロウト相手だと思って\n 手を抜いてやったんだイェイ！\n 次は:
I went easy on you 'cuz I thought you were
just some amateur! Next time, it's gonna
be the real deal!!

247038.「さあ もう一度！\n スノーボールバトルだイェイ！\n 俺様の実力に 震えるが:
Come on, one more time! Let's have a Snowball
Battle! I'll beat you so bad you'll wet your
pants!

247039.「くっ……！\n さっきの勝負で 指が かじかんで\n 雪玉が つかめなイェイ…:
Ah... my fingers are too cold from the last
game! I can't hold a snowball...!!

247040.「いつも いつも スボバに誘ってやってるのに\n 星夜祭で忙しいからと 断られ続:
I've been tryin' to get someone to play with
me, but everyone's so busy with the festival!
And I finally found someone who wasn't...

247042.「この季節に うちの宿屋に\n 泊まってくれたお客さん みなさんに\n 差し上げ:
It's a present for the festival that we give
to anyone who stays at our inn during the
holiday season.

247044.「うちは 宿屋でね。子どもの頃から\n 宿屋の仕事をしてるから 友だちと\n 星:
Everyone in my family are innkeepers. I've
been one ever since I was little, so I never
had a chance to celebrate it with my friends.

247045.「……だからね あなたの気持ちも\n ちょっぴり わかっちゃった。: So, I get it... I know how it feels.

247046.「スノーボールバトル すごく楽しかった！\n ……その手袋を はめて\n 私と:
That Snowball Battle was so much fun! Why
don't you use those gloves and play with me
again?

247047.「……フカフカで あったかい\n ステキな手袋だイェイ。:
W-wow... how lovely, warm, and fluffy these
gloves are...

247048.「白銀の星夜祭は お祭り騒ぎだけじゃねえのさ。\n 心をこめた プレゼントを 贈:
This festival is more than just a festive atmosphere. It's a day to give each other gifts, cherish your loved ones, and wish them
happiness for the year to come.

247049.「せっかくの 星夜祭なんだ。\n お前さんからも あの娘に\n プレゼントを あ:
It is the Starry Night Festival, after all.
Why don't you give her a gift, too?

247050.「もらってばかりじゃ スノーボールン様の\n 名がすたるイェイ！\n 貴様は ツ:
If you keep makin' me give, you're gonna
ruin my reputation! You were looking for some
kinda tree, right?

247052.「よしっ！ 星の大樹も 広場のみんなも\n これで すっかり 元通りだな！:
Jolly good! The tree and everyone else are
back to normal again!

247053.「魔物たち！ 妖精たち！\n そして アストルティアのみんな 集まれーっ！\n:
To the monsters, fairies, and everyone else
in Astoltia! Gather 'round! The Starry Night
Festival has officially begun!

247054.聖天の使いは 高らかに\nホイッスルを 吹き鳴らした！: The Holy Messenger blew his whistle loudly!

250781.「私 リッカって いうのよ。\n みんなを助けてくれて 本当に ありがとう！:
My name's Erinn. Thank you so much for helping
us all!
